plot: The residents of a small English village are about to lose their ancient railroad. They decide to rescue it by running it themselves, in competition with the local bus company.   Written by  Blair Stannard
title: Los apuros de un pequeño tren
plot_es: The residents of a small English village are about to lose their ancient railroad. They decide to rescue it by running it themselves, in competition with the local bus company.   Written by  Blair Stannard
plot_en: The residents of a small English village are about to lose their ancient railroad. They decide to rescue it by running it themselves, in competition with the local bus company.   Written by  Blair Stannard
